response.overview: Through behind-the-scenes video, exclusive interviews and incredible game action, this video production shows you the determination of the 1994 Huskers as they picked up where the 1993 team left off in their quest for the national champi- onship. Just when the Huskers are down to their third quarterback, the Husker defense takes it upon them- selves to carry the team through the transition stages. It was a spectacular season which includes the celebration surrounding Nebraska's Memorial Stadium's unprecedented 200th Consecutive Sellout.  This is one video you'll want for your collection as the 1994 Husker team could go down in history as one of the most determined, if not the most talented, in Nebraska history.
response.tagline: The Tale of the 1994 Nebraska Huskers
response.title: Fourth Straight Big Eight
